attributes.action: Appoint a properly independent and public enquiry in the Iraq War
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister must appoint a properly independent public enquiry including senior members of the military and the judiciary, not just Brown/Blair apparatchiks like Chilcot, Gilbert and Freedman. This is not transparent government, as promised by Blair and Brown, it is yet another Iraq War enquiry stitch-up.

rejection.details: Your petition may be out of date.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
